definitions: an intentionally misrepresented proposition that is set up because it is easier to defeat than an opponent's real argument

examples.text: her familiar procedure of creating a straw man by exaggerating their approach
you are constructing a straw man argument

definitions: a person regarded as having no substance or integrity

examples.text: a photogenic straw man gets inserted into office and advisers dictate policy

shortDefinitions: person regarded as having no substance or integrity
